headline: Jim Jordon Just Fired First Major “SHOT” at GoFundMe After They Removed Freedom Trucker’s $10M Donation Page
author: Missy Crane
sentences:
You can file a complaint here: https://t.co/4Y1H52rPis
Freedom Convoy: GoFundMe seizes funds of Canada 'occupation' – BBC News https://t.co/SMLkOI6936
— Attorney General Dave Yost (@DaveYostOH) February 5, 2022
Actually, here’s a list of everyone so far who’s ready to fight GoFundMe:
Current List of State Attorneys General Investigating GoFundMe:
-Florida
-Texas
-West Virginia
-Louisiana
-Missouri
-Georgia
— Election Wizard ??

At first, when the announcement came that GoFundMe was canceling the donation page, they refused to auto-refund donors and claimed they would take whatever was left of the $10 million after donors requested their own “refunds,” and donate to other charities, citing some goofy-a** “clause” in their terms of service.

Some small business owners went under after the streets were taken over by lawless dystopian kooks and customers were too afraid to “enter” the “zone.”
There were people who lived in the “occupied zone” that felt afraid to leave their homes, so they were prisoners in their own houses.

It’s beyond obvious that there was a clear political target happening here because as Jim Jordan very cleverly pointed out, GoFundMe happily supported the Antifa-run “CHOP” or “CHAZ” zone in Seattle, a place where people were murdered and raped, for the love of God.
The establishment elites are using Big Tech, banks, and anything else they can get their grubby hands on to silence political dissenters and nothing screams COMMUNISM more than that, right?
Well, obviously not, because last night in the wee hours of the morning, GoFundMe, feeling a lot of pressure, reversed course and announced they would refund everyone back their money.
Please, jump into this cause and battle and make it rain “political hellfire” all over your elected officials until we get justice for those Truckers and all freedom-loving patriots.
Last night Twitter erupted after GoFundMe teamed up with the Canadian government and removed the $10 million dollar donation page for the #FreedomTruckers.

(@ElectionWiz) February 5, 2022
****FOLLOW US ON TELEGRAM***
It’s time to make an example out of somebody in Big Tech, and GoFundMe is the perfect target.
Once again the globalist political elites using their power and position to team up with Big Tech to squash anyone who doesn’t toe the regime’s line.
The actual reason is that they’re real, powerful, and making Justin Trudeau and all globalist elites look like complete and total tyrannical nimrods.

#GoFundMe
— Attorney General Ken Paxton (@KenPaxtonTX) February 5, 2022
Update: And Ohio:
Did you donate to the #FreedomConvoy through #GoFundMe?

And holy cow, the backlash was intense.
Many people believed that GoFundMe was looking to steal the funds and make it as hard as possible for people to get their money back.
We need to keep up the pressure and make sure that our elected officials go after GoFundMe with the fire of a thousand suns.

(@JackPosobiec) February 5, 2022
Please, donate to the truckers and whatever you do, get involved and stay in this fight.
It’s time to hold someone in Big Tech responsible and send a clear message to everyone else who’s watching this unfold.

Use these guys: “Give Send Go.”
They’re a Christian organization and they won’t cancel patriotic causes.
But according to GoFundMe, THAT was all “a-okay,” but the Freedom Truckers are too violent and lawless?
Here’s what Jim said in his tweet: “GoFundMe promoted the ANTIFA-occupied CHOP zone in Seattle.

— Rep. Jim Jordan (@Jim_Jordan) February 5, 2022
Clearly, this is a total political hit job.
We’ve seen GoFundMe refund people’s accounts when donor pages were canceled in the past.
This BLM-backing company went woke, froze the funds, & failed to deliver Texans’ money.

It's been touch and go for the past 12 hours: https://t.co/C7YpkLTRCi
— Truckistan Amb.
And in the meantime, whatever you do, do not use GoFunMe for anything ever again.

We’ve got questions.”
GoFundMe promoted the ANTIFA-occupied CHOP zone in Seattle.
The reason was that the #Freedom Truckers were supposedly unlawful and violent.
Patriotic Texans donated to Canadian truckers’ worthy cause using GoFundMe.
Today I assembled a team to investigate their potential fraud & deception.
But they shut down fundraisers for truckers protesting #COVID mandates.
But they shut down fundraisers for truckers protesting #COVID mandates.
And Jim Jordan says no way – and he’s got questions… and so do we.
Some of the biggest and fiercest I’ve ever seen online.
I mean, the stupidity here is off the damn charts.
UPDATE: Looks like Texas just jumped into the mix.
If you are an Ohioan, I want to hear from you!
Seems to be a standard operating procedure.
Is it because the amount was so high?
Texas donors will get Justice!
Yet, this time, they deviated.
But that’s not good enough.
Stop making them rich.
And that has to stop.
Classic commie move.
We’ve got questions.
Here is the link.
Give me a break.
They hate you.
It was DEEP.
Poso ??
